mapper.insert: insert into replyboard(no, replyno, id, reply, ip) values(${no} ,reply_sq.nextval, #{id},#{reply} ,#{ip})
mapper.select: select replyno, no, reply, id,writedate from replyboard where no=${param1} oreder by replyno desc
mapper.update: update replyboard set reply=#{reply} where replyno=replyno and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from replyboard where no=${param1} and id=#{param2}
